sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Leafnode package contains leafnode-version, leafnode, applyfilter, texpire, checkgroups, fetchnews and newsq.

sect3.title: leafnode
sect3.para: leafnode is the NNTP server daemon.

sect3.title: applyfilter
sect3.para: applyfilter filters newsgroup articles according to regular expressions.

sect3.title: texpire
sect3.para: texpire expires old articles and unread groups.

sect3.title: checkgroups
sect3.para: checkgroups inserts newsgroup titles into the newsgroup database.

sect3.title: fetchnews
sect3.para: fetchnews sends posted articles to and retrieves new articles from an upstream news server.

sect3.title: newsq
sect3.para: newsq shows articles waiting to be sent upstream.
